item.title: Persiapan Vim plug
item.description: Persiapan Vim Plug get name file ide buat file untuk kode (dipisah pisah) function ditaruh di plug if else hugo : get file path search content bvE help v/foo $^0 20gg :20 t \w|\W or f use ; ctrl+d scroll down ctrl+u scroll up shift-` uppercase | lowerchase

item.title: Link Inspirasi Projek Mendatang
item.description: link repo https://github.com/ianfleon/blognitess link artikel https://iamsorush.com/posts/table-of-content-blog/ npm markdownit/hugo sass uglyfy.js node-watch@0.7.2 express js bash : merger js step dev : parse content copy content watch + server: code (masih bisa diperbaiki) var watch = require('node-watch'); "use strict"; const express = require("express"); const app = express(); const port = process.env.port || 5005; // https://expressjs.com/en/4x/api.html#express.static let options = { dotfiles: "ignore", //allow, deny, ignore etag: true, extensions: ["htm", "html"], index: false, //to disable directory indexing maxAge: "7d", redirect: false, setHeaders: function(res, path, stat) { //add this header to all static responses res.
